Kim Jong Il's work published in Trinidad and Tobago
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's work published in Trinidad and Tobago 
    Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "On thoroughly establishing the system of party leadership" was published in booklet by the heritage publishing house of Trinidad and Tobago on September 14.
   The work was released on April 28, Juche 68 (1979).

articles.title: Preparatory committee for celebrating WPK anniversary formed in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Preparatory committee for celebrating WPK anniversary formed in Ethiopia 
    Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- An inaugural meeting of a preparatory committee was held by the Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, group for the study of the Juche idea on Sep. 12 to mark the 55th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   The meeting elected the head of the group chairman of the committee and decided on programme of functions to be held on the WPK anniversary.

DPRK Foreign Minister meets new Yugoslav ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister meets new Yugoslav ambassador 
    Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, Foreign Minister of the DPRK, today met and conversed with Milorad Kosovac, new Yugoslav ambassador to Korea, who paid a courtesy call on him.
